Name: Surgeball
About the game: Strap on your rocket boots and take aim for a high speed, competitive sport set in the heart of a neon clad-futuristic city. Choose a side and keep your fuel tank full to retain an edge over your opponents. Battle it out to bring your team to glory and claim the title of Surgeball champions. Surgeball is a first-person, team-oriented ball sport with a retro-futuristic aesthetic. There are couple of twists, you can only move the ball by shooting it, and everyone is on jet powered skates. Features: 1v1 - 4v4 online competitive play 4 different characters to choose from, each with a different role and play style Physics based ball movement Colour-blind support Disclaimer: Surgeball is a student project that was developed solely by one person over 7 months.
